db.description:
Spread the value of Cookpad and build an unrivaled platform for every household in Vietnam to share cooking experience, with the help of Cookpad International Business Development team. In short term, this role requires hands-on operational activities in Vietnam to develop user community by oneself. Once built up operational flow, the role will manage communities with Cookpad International team.

Location: work remotely from Vietnam
db.requirement:
Passion to solve problems in areas of cooking/food/lifestyle related, especially in your local community
Entrepreneurial mindset, self-driven
Super User-Focused mindset
Knowledge of Internet
Superb communication skill to deliver value of Cookpad to users
Business level proficiency in English
Able to travel locally
Work experience in international team environment

more.requirement: Passion to solve problems in areas of cooking/food/lifestyle related, especially in your local community Entrepreneurial mindset, self-driven Super User-Focused mindset Knowledge of Internet Superb communication skill to deliver value of Cookpad to users Business level proficiency in English Able to travel locally Work experience in international team environment
